long_description: Whether you're sightseeing, beachcombing or running errands, you'll love the feel of the women's Aventura Afton Shorts, with their ramie/organic cotton/spandex blend. Light stretch makes these shorts forgiving as you bend or walk. Organic cotton offers breathable comfort and easy care. Waistband lining features a fun contrast print pattern. Hand and 2 rear pockets, plus 1 small button-down pocket on lower thigh. Aventura Afton Shorts have a 9.5-in. inseam. Closeout.
short_description: Whether you're sightseeing, beachcombing or running errands, you'll love the feel of the women's Aventura Afton Shorts, with their ramie/organic cotton/spandex blend.
